about.description: Programmer since 2012, based in Mexico, passionate about frontend development and drawn to the backend. Recently, I have focused my professional development on e-commerce with Magento, but I am always open to learning new technologies and skills.

freelance.fabrica: In collaboration with the consulting firm Liquen, we created the website for the film production company, one of my first works. I would like to update it.
freelance.unimedik: Apply proposed design to the different pages of the internal office application.
freelance.gandhi: Creation and modification of functionalities for the middleware between version 1 and 2 of the site.
freelance.retop: Creation and modification of functionality to complete a purchase. Some design adjustments.
